scene.name: intro
scene.line: Hey. Hey, wake up. You spaced out for a minute there.
scene.option: What do you keep out in that barn?

scene.name: weaver-complains-about-tv
scene.line: That TV is picking up the wrong signal. My cousin Shannon would know more about it. She fixes TVs for a living. Well, she used to ... I think the new models are giving her some trouble.
scene.option: So ... I really just need to get to the |Zero|.

scene.name: cousin
scene.line: That's my father's brother's daughter, Shannon. We're about the same age. Well, we used to be. She's older now.
She has a workshop up north a ways, by the lake. Right where Peonia and Wax road meet. It's a big bait and tackle shop, and she fixes TVs in the back. Do you like fishing?

scene.name: whats-in-barn
scene.line: Used to be tools and feed. Then books. Now, I think it's mostly spiders.

scene.name: the-zero
scene.line: Honestly, I'm not convinced you should bother with the |Zero|; I'd much rather you find my cousin and fix my TV. But I'll get you headed the right way.
So, it's pretty easy: get back on sixty-five heading north, then take the first right after the artificial limb factory. From there, your arrival at the |Zero| is basically inevitable.
Nice to know you, Conway. Keep your eyes open. Especially in the dark!
